attempt_communication.title: Harmonic Dialogue
attempt_communication.description: Using the traditional crystal-singing techniques, you attempt to harmonize with the chaotic frequencies. Gradually, patterns emerge from the noise - not random disruption, but a message. The harmonics spell out coordinates, timestamps, and what appears to be... a distress call? Something or someone trapped in the Depths is crying for help.

choices.text: 'I need to follow these coordinates to find who's trapped.'
'This distress call might be a trap - I should investigate carefully.'
'The timestamps suggest this connects to other crisis events.'
'I need to get help before going deeper.'
